entries.name: new(gem, security_policy)
entries.desc: Creates a new old-format package reader for gem.  Old-format packages cannot be written.

entries.name: contents()
entries.desc: A list of file names contained in this gem

entries.name: extract_files(destination_dir)
entries.desc: Extracts the files in this package into destination_dir

entries.name: verify()
entries.desc: Raises an exception if a security policy that verifies data is active. Old format gems cannot be verified as signed.
